short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tifinagh Converter simplifies the transliteration of Tifinagh characters to Arabic/Latin and facilitates typing in Tifinagh.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Tifinagh Converter Chrome extension is a versatile tool designed to facilitate the typing, conversion, and transliteration of Tifinagh script, an ancient North African alphabet used by the Amazigh (Berber) people. With this extension, users can effortlessly interact with Tifinagh characters across various web pages, enhancing accessibility and promoting the preservation of this unique cultural heritage.

Key Features:

Virtual Keyboard: Utilize a virtual keyboard interface to input Tifinagh characters with ease using the mouse. Simply click on the virtual keys to type Tifinagh letters directly into text fields or text areas on web pages.

Keyboard Transliteration: Seamlessly convert Latin characters to their corresponding Tifinagh equivalents as you type. For example, typing "z" on your keyboard will automatically display the Tifinagh character "âµ£" in text fields.

Clipboard Copy: Copy Tifinagh text to the clipboard effortlessly for easy sharing and pasting into other applications or documents. Simply select the desired Tifinagh text and use the extension's copy feature to quickly copy it to the clipboard.

Text Transliteration: Instantly transliterate Tifinagh text found on any web page into Arabic or Latin script. Highlight the Tifinagh text you wish to transliterate, and the extension will automatically convert it to your preferred script, enhancing readability and comprehension.
